player.title: Waveform Player
player.description: A powerful and customizable React waveform player component

features.title: Features
features.waveform: Waveform Visualization: Real-time audio waveform display with multiple rendering styles
features.playback: Playback Control: Complete playback control including play, pause, seek, and more
features.customization: Customization: Rich customization options for colors, sizes, spacing, and more
features.responsive: Responsive Design: Adapts to different screen sizes
features.events: Event Callbacks: Rich event callback interfaces

recorder.title: Waveform Recorder
recorder.description: A powerful and customizable React waveform audio recorder component

installation.title: Installation
installation.description: Install @waveform/player-react using your favorite package manager:

basicUsage.title: Basic Usage
basicUsage.description: After installation, you can use the Waveform Player component in your React application:

features.title: Features
features.learnMore: To learn more about using Waveform Player, check out:

props.title: Component Props
props.description: The Player component is the main component of Waveform Player. It accepts the following props:

basicConfig.title: Basic Configuration
basicConfig.src: Audio file URL, supports all browser-supported audio formats
basicConfig.samplePoints: Number of waveform sample points. Higher values mean more detail but more performance cost
basicConfig.height: Player height in pixels, defaults to 200

styleConfig.title: Style Configuration
styleConfig.type: Waveform rendering type: 'bars' (bar graph), 'line' (line graph), 'mirror' (mirror graph)
styleConfig.gradient: Waveform color gradient configuration with 'from' and 'to' colors
styleConfig.progressGradient: Played portion color gradient configuration with 'from' and 'to' colors

callbacks.title: Event Callbacks
callbacks.onTimeUpdate: Called when playback time updates, with current time in seconds
callbacks.onError: Called when an error occurs, with error object

hooks.title: Hooks API
hooks.description: Waveform Player provides a set of hooks to help you control the player and get player state:

playerControls.title: usePlayerControls
playerControls.stop: Stop playback and return to start

waveform.title: usePlayerWaveform
waveform.peaks: Waveform data array, each element ranges from -1 to 1
